comments.body: Blocking for name discussion. Could also go with SimpleLooper if this is too general?

this reminds me of the ncall and nexpr we have in Base.Catesian, so maybe that could be a source for name

LoopDeLoop?
I'm tending away from Looper as it seems like too big of a name to take for something so meek.
